SELECT hinfo.*,house.housetitle housenam,house.adorn houseshow,thp.dayprice,tu.username,tht.` housetype` housetypes,tbt.bedtypename,thl.leasetype leasetypes, tui.img,thi.ketingimgurl,thi.chufangimgurl,thi.qitaimgurl,thi.woshiimgurl,thi.wsjimgurl FROM t_houseinfo hinfo left JOIN t_housedescribe house ON hinfo.hoseid=house.houseid LEFT join t_house_type tht ON hinfo.housetypeid=tht.` housetypeid` LEFT JOIN t_bed_type tbt ON hinfo.bedtypeid=tbt.bedtypeid LEFT JOIN t_house_leasetype thl ON thl.typeid=hinfo.leasetype
LEFT join t_house_price thp ON hinfo.hoseid = thp.houseid
LEFT JOIN t_house_img thi ON thi.houseid=hinfo.hoseid left join t_user tu ON tu.userid=hinfo.userid left JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.userid=tu.userid ORDER BY hinfo.housegrade DESC limit 0,9

LEFT join t_house_price thp ON hinfo.hoseid = thp.houseid
LEFT JOIN t_house_img thi ON thi.houseid=hinfo.hoseid left join t_user tu ON tu.userid=hinfo.userid left JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.userid=tu.userid ORDER BY hinfo.housegrade DESC where hinfo.status = 2
